QuestData.Title: Rites of the Talonpriests
QuestData.Description:
That gavel was once known as Beakbreaker. In his final, darkest days, Terokk used it to perform grim, damnable acts of sacrifice.
It is best not to dwell on those days.
Terokk was sealed away deep within the shadows to rest, and perhaps to heal.
Making contact with him will take a great deal of effort, so in the meantime, allow me to tell you of his more glorious exploits. Before this wretched curse took hold.
Please, place the gavel upon the effigy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place Terokk's Gavel on the Effigy of Terokk.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Place Terokk's Gavel on the Effigy of Terokk.
QuestData.RewardText: <As you place the gavel at the base of the effigy, Reshad speaks over your shoulder.>
